fields.Video Description: This video was recorded in Guishan, Taiwan, where Ibrahim is currently studying abroad.
italki call to action: Get a free French lesson with italki: http://promos.italki.com/wikitongues_fra
Demographics: 60,000,000 in France (ELDIA 2012). Population total all countries: 74,980,460.
2,350,000 in Niger (2006). Population total all countries: 2,438,900.
600,000 in Burkina Faso (1999 SIL). Population total all countries: 813,000.
2,770,000 in Mauritania (2006), increasing. Population total all countries: 3,278,190.
250,000 in Mali (1991). Population total all countries: 281,200.
1,000,000 in Mali (2007 S. Crickmore). Population total all countries: 1,008,500.
YouTube License Statement: The speaker(s) featured herein have not explicitly agreed to distribute this video for reuse. For inquiries on licensing this video, please contact hello@wikitongues.org.
fields.Geneaology: "[ Indo-European, Italic, Romance, Italo-Western, Western, Gallo-Iberian, Gallo-Romance, Gallo-Rhaetian, O√Øl, French ]; [ Nilo-Saharan, Songhai, Southern ]; [ Niger-Congo, Atlantic-Congo, Volta-Congo, North, Gur, Central, Northern, Oti-Volta, Gurma ]; [ Afro-Asiatic, Semitic, Central, South, Arabic ]; [ Afro-Asiatic, Berber, Tamasheq, Southern ]; [ Niger-Congo, Atlantic-Congo, Atlantic, Northern, Senegambian, Fula-Wolof, Fula, West Central ]"
